data.text: Nkua lulendo ; Nzambi, Yave
Tona ku Sioni, wufuana mu kitoko ;
Nzambi eto wulembo yizi,
Niandi wunkutikisanga diyilu ku yilu
Lukhutikisila batu bama bobo ndibieka,
Ayi diyilu dilembo yamikisa busonga buandi,
Luwa, beno batu bama ;
Ndilendi kutemina ko mu diambu di makaba maku
Ndisi mfunu wu ngombi yi mbakala yi luphangu luaku ko,
Bila minu phuidi bibulu bioso bi nsitu
Nzebi zinuni zioso zi miongo,
Enati nzala ndimona, buna ndilendi kukamba buawu ko
Minu minsuni mi zingombi zimbakala ndiela dia
Tambika makaba ma phutudulu matondo kuidi Nzambi
Ayi wuthela mu lumbu ki ziphasi,
Vayi Nzambi wulembo kambi mutu wumbimbi :
Ngeyo wunlendanga zindongi ziama
Ngeyo bu mueni muivi,
Wunsadilanga munuꞌaku mu diambu di mambimbi,
Ngeyo wuntubidilanga khombꞌaku
Mambu mana mawu wuvanga
Luyindula diambu diadi : beno lunzimbakananga Nzambi ;
Woso wuntambikanga makaba ma phutudulu matondo
